Question: ICOP Technology Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
ICOP Technology Inc.

Product: Foldable TV C Seed N1

- 137-inch TV that folds and unfolds
- Custom-built with a bright, seamless picture
- Screen can rotate 180 degrees and folds up into a compact rectangular chunk

Product: Portable OLED display ZenScreen Fold OLED MQ17QH

- 17.3-inch portable OLED display that folds
- Offers superior image quality
- Ideal for on-the-go movies or gaming

Product: Electric air taxi Supernal S-A2

- VTOL design for noiseless, sustainable air travel
- Designed for short trips with modular upgrade capabilities
- Represents a new era for electric air travel

Product: Honda 0 series EV range

- Features aircraft-like steering wheel and "steer-by-wire" controls
- Includes futuristic LED grilles highlighting the new "floating H" logo
- Promises a joyous driving experience

Product: AI ChatGPT and similar generative AI chatbots

- Showcased in various tech products at CES 2024
- Represents the pervasive presence of AI at the event
- Demonstrates the integration of AI in consumer tech industry
